name: aaron levin
body:
### welcome

I haven't maintained a personal website in some time. I am trying to move away from Facebook and Twitter ([@aaronmblevin](http://www.twitter.com/aaronmblevin)) doesn't afford me the space I need to properly rant about democratically-planned economics and free monads.

I hope you enjoy.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
